document_data.caption: A map showing Latif Island southeast of Mushir Island.
document_data.name: Latif Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Latif Island''' was a small island within the [[Crowded Sea]] of [[interior Zakhara]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2bSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Latif Island was located southwest of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] region of Zakhara. It formed a portion of the southern tail of [[Al-Faraq Islands]]. The island was small, measuring only {{SI|25|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. Much of the northeast section of the island was covered in rock, while the southwest section supported scattered grasslands. Coral reefs were found offshore of the north and east parts of Latif Island. The island was uninhabited as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
